Name: LobbyDesc_Assassin
Text_English:
Those who lost everything from the demon invasion
moved to the quiet woods and formed an assassin's syndicate.
Assassins, specialized in quick and deadly strikes,
are always seeking revenge.
Text_Korean:
那些在惡魔襲擊中失去家園和家人的人搬到了寂靜森林，並組成了一個刺客來報仇。
刺客是複仇的化身，敏捷地挖掘敵人的弱點並在瞬間制服它。

Name: LobbyDesc_Gladiator
Text_English:
Among the royal family, only those with unbending faith
could become gladiators. With unmatched valor,
the gladiator brings justice to his enemies with a pair of giant blades.
Text_Korean:
在高貴的皇室中，只有那些相信自己的劍神光能製服惡魔的人才會被選為角斗士。
角斗士身穿堅固的盔甲和強大的劍，是一位正義的法官，以堅定的勇氣譴責邪惡。

Name: LobbyDesc_Wizard
Text_English:
Wizards are those who can bring about one's true potential.
It can neutralize enemies by using magic, freezing time and space at will. She commands the battlefield with an overwhelming attack.
Text_Korean:
能夠將自己的精神力發揮到極限並發揮人類所有潛力的人被稱為巫師。
他是戰鬥的仲裁者，以強大的魔法對敵人造成巨大傷害，並通過覆蓋空間和時間使他們喪失行動能力冰……

Name: LobbyDesc_Fighter
Text_English:
Coming from the east, fighters are capable of using chi
to empower one's own body.
They can crush anything with their bare hands,
thus feared by many who have witnessed what they can do.
Text_Korean:
戰士是那些掌握了東方武術，並達到了僅靠自己的身體和精神就可以擊敗惡魔的人

以強壯的身體和溢出的戰鬥力打破敵人勢頭的戰士精神
它是恐懼的對象。

Text_English:
-2–8 letters allowed (Kor/Eng/Num)-
-You cannot use inappropriate words.-
Text_Korean:

Name: ActOpen_Title_1
Text_Korean: 第 1 幕 Luemos 公開賽

Name: ActOpen_Desc_1
Text_English:
Luemos, the city of light, is in trouble.
Lord Alfrid is in need of assistance.
Text_Korean:
曾經被稱為光之城的魯埃莫斯發生了重大變化。
阿爾弗雷德勳爵正在等待您的幫助。

Name: ActClear_Title_1
Text_Korean: 第一幕 解放魯埃莫斯

Name: ActClear_Desc_1
Text_English: Caligula is defeated, and Luemos is free now.
Text_Korean: 卡利古拉的野心破滅了，魯莫斯獲釋。

Name: ActOpen_Title_2
Text_English: ACT 2 To the Forest of Fairies

Name: ActOpen_Desc_2
Text_English:
Corruption is spreading throughout the Forest of Fairies.
We must restore the forest for Remiel.
Text_Korean:
腐化的能量，在生命之力溢出的仙林中蔓延開來。
您必須為拉米爾重振森林。

Name: ActClear_Desc_2
Text_English: Now that the corruption has stopped, the forest has started to restore itself.
Text_Korean: 腐化的氣息消失，仙林開始復蘇。

Name: ActOpen_Title_3
Text_Korean: 第三幕古代英雄墓開啟

Name: ActOpen_Desc_3
Text_English:
The ancient tombs have become a stronghold of evil.
We must defeat the demons and open the path.
Text_Korean:
遠古英雄的墳墓，已經變成了強大的魔界。
我們必須消滅邪惡，為等待幫助的人開闢道路。

Name: ActClear_Title_3
Text_Korean: 第三幕 闖過古代英雄的墳墓

Name: ActClear_Desc_3
Text_English: Beelzebub is gone, and the path to the Soul Fortress is open.
Text_Korean: Belzebub已經倒下，通往靈魂城堡的道路已經打開。

Name: ActOpen_Desc_4
Text_English:
A dark conspiracy is ensuing at the souls' resting place.
Stop the dark forces and find the saint lady.
Text_Korean:
一個黑暗的陰謀正在靈魂城堡中進行，靈魂的避風港。
您必須阻止陰謀並找到神秘的聖人。

Name: ActClear_Title_4
Text_Korean: 第四幕 奪回靈魂城堡

Name: ActClear_Desc_4
Text_English: Azrael's flaming hatred is gone, and the souls are at peace again.
Text_Korean: 阿茲莉爾的仇恨餘燼熄滅，靈魂安息。

Name: ActOpen_Title_5
Text_Korean: 穿孔的 Nifelheim 的第 5 幕開幕

Name: ActOpen_Desc_5
Text_English:
Lady Miracle is held captive at the Sky Castle.
We must save her.
Text_Korean:
聖奇蹟被黑暗使徒統治的天界城堡俘獲。
我必須救她。

Name: ActClear_Title_5
Text_Korean: 第 5 幕穿孔的尼菲爾海姆倒塌

Name: ActClear_Desc_5
Text_English: Nidhogg is gone, and the sky castle has been destroyed.

Name: ActOpen_Title_6
Text_Korean: 第 6 幕黑暗領域塔爾塔羅斯開啟

Name: ActOpen_Desc_6
Text_English:
Miracle and Ramiel were sucked in through a huge portal.
You have to find them.
Text_Korean:
Miracle和Ramiel通過一個巨大的門戶被吸入。
你必須找到他們。

Name: ActClear_Title_6
Text_English: Act 6 Conquest of the Dark Realm of Tartarus
Text_Korean: 第六幕 征服塔爾塔羅斯的黑暗領域

Name: ActClear_Desc_6
Text_English: Apocalypse came to an end and set up a banner of light on Tartarus.
Text_Korean: 天啟結束，在塔爾塔洛斯豎起了一面光之旗幟。

Name: ActOpen_Title_7
Text_English: Act 7 The Sanctuary of Light Elysium Opened
Text_Korean: 第 7 幕光明極樂聖殿開放

Name: ActOpen_Desc_7
Text_English:
Absolute darkness and Daniel took over Elysium.
You must drive them out and retake Elysium.
Text_Korean:
絕對的黑暗和丹尼爾接管了極樂世界。
您必須將他們趕出並奪回極樂世界。

Name: ActClear_Title_7
Text_English: Act 7 Retake Elysium, Sanctuary of Light
Text_Korean: Act 7 奪回極樂世界，光之聖殿

Name: ActClear_Desc_7
Text_English: Absolute darkness has disappeared and Elysium and Ramiel have been restored.
Text_Korean: 絕對的黑暗消失了，極樂世界和拉米爾已經恢復。

Name: EventLimitedPointShop_GuidePopUpDescription
Text_English:
You can collect event points by growing the equipment as follows.

1) Achieve level 3 or higher equipment at level 30
2) Acquire equipment of level 3 or higher through synthesis
3) Level 3 through promotion Acquiring the above equipment

Please refer to the table below for the points that can be obtained from each activity!
Text_Korean:
您可以通過培養以下裝備來收集事件點數。

1）在 30 級時達到 3 級或更高級別的設備
2）通過合成獲得 3 級或更高級別的設備
3）3 級通過促銷獲得以上裝備

各項活動可獲得的積分請參考下表！

Name: CounterDG_BossExplanation
Text_English:
The Dark Guardian, who guards the Upgrade Stones hidden by demons, wields a large
axe to block intruders.
You can get many Upgrade Stones depending on the risk, but the Dark Guardian becomes more powerful. Look out.
Text_Korean:
守護被惡魔隱藏的升級石的黑暗守護者揮舞著一把大
斧頭阻止入侵者。
您可以根據風險獲得許多升級石，但黑暗守護者變得更加強大。小心。

Name: RaidMain_BossDesc1
Text_English:
Harang, who appeared violently on the day when the dawn of darkness was felt,
makes a fierce attack and defense with its 4 large claws.
You have to beware of Harang's powerful surprise attack.
Text_Korean:
在感覺到黑暗黎明的那天猛烈出現的Harang，
用它的4個大爪子進行猛烈的攻擊和防禦。
你必須提防Harang強大的突然襲擊。

Name: RaidMain_BossDesc2
Text_English:
Sargon, guarding the snowy mountains covered in darkness
blows out a cold chill that freezes everything.
Beware of heavy rains, winds, and breath that freezes everything.
Text_Korean:
薩爾貢，守衛著被黑暗覆蓋的雪山
吹出寒冷的寒冷，凍結了一切。
提防大雨，大風和會凍結一切的呼吸。

Name: QualityChange_Guide_1

Name: ItemFactory_Alert_Forge
Text_English:
Among the material items, equipment items need to be directly registered through selection.
In case of production failure, some of the material items will be returned.
It is not possible to select an equipped item as an equipment material.
Text_Korean:
材料項目中，設備項目需要通過選擇直接註冊。
如果生產失敗，部分材料項目將被退回。
不能選擇裝備項目作為設備材料。

Name: ItemFactory_Alert_Upgrade
Text_English:
When upgrading, all enchantment information of the item set as the main material is transferred.
Equipment items need to be directly registered through selection among material items.
In case of failure to upgrade, some of the material items will be returned.
Equipped Items that have been made cannot be selected as equipment materials.
Text_Korean:
升級時，作為主要材料的物品的所有附魔信息都會被轉移。
裝備物品需要通過材料物品的選擇進行註冊。
如果升級失敗，部分材料物品將被退回.
已製作的裝備物品不能選擇為裝備材料。
